Ensure at least one file named /usr/lib/systemd/system/emergency.service exists and matches pattern ^\s*ExecStart\s*=\s*-\/bin\/sh\s+-c\s+"(\/usr)?\/sbin\/sulogin;\s+\/usr\/bin\/systemctl\s+(--fail|--job-mode=fail)\s+--no-block default"\s*(\s+#.*)?$
